channel.title: Jordan-Holder on EduGovNet.com
channel.description: Recent content in Jordan-Holder on EduGovNet.com

item.title: Even Permutations and Some Simple Non-Abelian Groups
item.description: In this entry we prove that A_n is normal when n >= 5. We then use this result to prove that there is no generalization of “even” and “odd” permutation to three or more classes – i.e. there is no class of homomorphisms into Z_n, where n > 2.

item.title: Zassenhaus Lemma and the Jordan Holder Theorem
item.description: This entry starts out by building to Zassenhaus' Lemma, and finishes by proving the Jordan-Holder theorem about subnormal sequences for finite groups. Enjoy!
